channel.title: What would the code be for
channel.description:
What would the code be for, if i want to add Slayer, say if attacknpc = Whatever, how would i do that? so I attack a certain npc, and it gets my Slayer up.]
Thanks, help is greatly appreciated, rep :)

item.title: What would the code be for
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Objects are better.
For an objetc, add the id (8132) makeGlobalobject and add this.

      case 8132:
            if (GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
                if (actionTimer == 0) {
                    sendMessage("You are training slayer! Heres exp!"); //by Tonypker13 of Rubiks scape
                    actionTimer = 10;
                    setAnimation(423);
                    addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[16]), 16);
                    stillgfx(199, absY, absX);
                    updateRequired = true;
                    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                }
            }
            break;

But if you want NPC’s, heres what you do.

Search for boolean slayer = true;

add this underneath.

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 41) { if (playerLevel[18] >= 1) { slayer = true; addSkillXP(60 * playerLevel[18], 18); } else { slayer = false; sendMessage( "You need a slayer level of 1 to attack chickens."); } } (add more of these and edit for dif NPC’s)

and the end will look like this. (for me)

[code] boolean slayer = true;

            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 41) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 1) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(60 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 1 to attack chickens.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 90) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 10) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(120 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 10 to attack skeletons.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1648) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 20) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(180 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 20 to attack crawling hands.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1832) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 30) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(210 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 30 to attack cave bugs.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1637) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 40) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(240 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 40 to attack jellys.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1604) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 55) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(270 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 55 to attack aberrant specters.");
                }
            }[/code]

Read full topic
